mapper.select: {CALL sp_producto_inicial_ins( #{idProductoInicial, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = INOUT}, #{fechaRegistro, jdbcType = DATE, mode = IN}, #{prensa, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{tipoLadrillo, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{cantidadProducido, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{cantidadEstimada, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{activo, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{usuarioCreacion, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{resultado, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = OUT}, #{cCodigo, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = INOUT}, #{pesoLadrillo, jdbcType = DECIMAL, mode = IN}, #{roturaAlambre, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{mezcla, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{amperaje, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{fallaMecanica, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{observaciones, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
